title: GET_ENTITY_ANIM_TOTAL_TIME
content:
0x50BD2730B191E3600x433A9D18// GetEntityAnimTotalTime
float GET_ENTITY_ANIM_TOTAL_TIME(Entity entity, char* animDict, char* animName);Returns a float value representing animation's total playtime in milliseconds.  
Example:  
GET_ENTITY_ANIM_TOTAL_TIME(PLAYER_ID(),"amb@world_human_yoga@female@base","base_b")   
return 20800.000000  
Animations list
codeBlocks:
// GetEntityAnimTotalTime
float GET_ENTITY_ANIM_TOTAL_TIME(Entity entity, char* animDict, char* animName);

Returns a float value representing animation's total playtime in milliseconds.  
Example:  
GET_ENTITY_ANIM_TOTAL_TIME(PLAYER_ID(),"amb@world_human_yoga@female@base","base_b")   
return 20800.000000
